thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Trump says he is sticking with tariffs, may 'go up or down' with some countries

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Trump says he is sticking with tariffs, may 'go up or down' with some countries
text:
WASHINGTON, March 8 (Reuters) - President Donald Trump said on Thursday he was sticking to his plans for 25 percent tariffs on steel imports and 10 percent on aluminum imports but would have flexibility to change those for specific countries.
“I’m sticking with 10 and 25 (percent) initially. I’ll have a right to go up or down, depending on the country, and I’ll have a right to drop out countries or add countries,” he told reporters at the beginning of a Cabinet meeting at the White House.
Trump said he would be fair and flexible on the issue while protecting American workers.
The president’s plans have irritated U.S. allies and sparked concerns about a trade war. (Reporting by Jeff Mason; editing by Jonathan Oatis)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
